title: looking for team to join ranked
body:
i am a highly co-operative player looking for team to play ranked with. i don't have a main haven't meshed with anyone yet so mostly play fill. have been playing since beta i know about the game. looking to work/train with team for strategy tired of playing randoms with no support or teamwork. currently on oce server. player name is : pikachoosRus. looking to find a role and work with ppl any position. 

cheers,

replies.body:
Hey

I am trying to get a bit of a team/community together for improving together.

https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/team-recruitment/kaB0hk15-lets-make-an-improvement-focused-flex-teamcommunity-bronze-silver-gold
